title: Jeep Compass discounts hit Rs 2.95 lakh this month
description: Other than the Wrangler, every other Jeep India SUV – the Compass, Meridian and Grand Cherokee – get around Rs 3 lakh in discounts, benefits and offers during the month of June. That discounts on the Compass have increased shows that the brand is feeling the pressure of slow sales. In the last six months, Jeep despatched an average of 147 Compass SUVs to its dealers; for reference, Meridian sales averaged 102 units in the same period. Without further digression, here’s how much you could save on your new Jeep SUV. Disclaimer: Discounts vary from city to city and are subject to stock availability. Please check with your local dealer for the exact figures. Jeep Compass discounts have increased from Rs 2.7 lakh to Rs 2.95 lakh Jeep Meridian discounts continue at Rs 3.9 lakh Jeep Grand Cherokee discounts continue at Rs 3 lakh Jeep Compass discounts in June 2025 Up to Rs 2.95 lakh off Comprising of cash discounts, free accessories, corporate discounts and other exchange offers, the Jeep Compass has a total of Rs 2.95 lakh worth of benefits this month. The Jeep Compass has been on sale since 2017 – it got a facelift in 2021 –and while it had initially launched with petrol and diesel engine options, it is now available only with a diesel. The diesel unit is a 170hp, 2.0-litre four-cylinder engine that comes paired with either a 6-speed manual gearbox or a 9-speed torque converter automatic. Only the top-spec Compass Model S gets 4x4 tech as an option. Jeep recently launched the Compass Sandstorm Edition, which is essentially an accessories pack on the lower-spec Sports, Longitude and Longitude (O) variants. Prices for the Compass range between Rs 18.99 lakh and Rs 32.41 lakh. Jeep Meridian discounts in June 2025 Up to Rs 3.9 lakh off The Meridian, which is now available with an entry-level 5-seat variant alongside three 7-seat variants, gets total benefits to the tune of Rs 3.9 lakh. This includes a corporate discount of up to Rs 1.3 lakh on MY2024 models. The larger version of the Compass shares its powertrain options, and is currently priced between Rs 24.99 lakh and Rs 38.79 lakh. Jeep Grand Cherokee discounts in June 2025 Up to Rs 3 lakh off Along with a total of Rs 3 lakh in benefits, buyers of Jeep’s flagship SUV can avail free access to the Jeep Wave Exclusive ownership programme, which clubs various aftersales benefits like a warranty pack, adventure concierge services, and more. The Grand Cherokee is powered by a 272hp, 2.0-litre turbo-petrol engine that is paired to an 8-speed automatic that transmits power to all four wheels. Just last week, the American brand introduced the Grand Cherokee Signature Edition at Rs 69.04 lakh, which costs Rs 1.54 lakh more than the Rs 67.5 lakh Limited (O). All prices, ex-showroom, India IMAGE SOURCE: Aman Automotive via YouTube Also see: Jeep Meridian long term review, 11,500km report New Jeep Cherokee revealed with hybrid powertrain Jeep Wrangler Willys ’41 Edition sold out in India

html:
Total benefits and offers on the Jeep Meridian and Grand Cherokee remain the same.

Other than the Wrangler, every other Jeep India SUV – the Compass, Meridian and Grand Cherokee – get around Rs 3 lakh in discounts, benefits and offers during the month of June. That discounts on the Compass have increased shows that the brand is feeling the pressure of slow sales. In the last six months, Jeep despatched an average of 147 Compass SUVs to its dealers; for reference, Meridian sales averaged 102 units in the same period. Without further digression, here’s how much you could save on your new Jeep SUV.

Disclaimer: Discounts vary from city to city and are subject to stock availability. Please check with your local dealer for the exact figures.

  1. Jeep Compass discounts have increased from Rs 2.7 lakh to Rs 2.95 lakh
  2. Jeep Meridian discounts continue at Rs 3.9 lakh
  3. Jeep Grand Cherokee discounts continue at Rs 3 lakh

Jeep Compass discounts in June 2025

Up to Rs 2.95 lakh off

Comprising of cash discounts, free accessories, corporate discounts and other exchange offers, the Jeep Compass has a total of Rs 2.95 lakh worth of benefits this month. The Jeep Compass has been on sale since 2017 – it got a facelift in 2021 –and while it had initially launched with petrol and diesel engine options, it is now available only with a diesel. The diesel unit is a 170hp, 2.0-litre four-cylinder engine that comes paired with either a 6-speed manual gearbox or a 9-speed torque converter automatic. Only the top-spec Compass Model S gets 4x4 tech as an option. Jeep recently launched the Compass Sandstorm Edition, which is essentially an accessories pack on the lower-spec Sports, Longitude and Longitude (O) variants. Prices for the Compass range between Rs 18.99 lakh and Rs 32.41 lakh.

Jeep Meridian discounts in June 2025

Up to Rs 3.9 lakh off

The Meridian, which is now available with an entry-level 5-seat variant alongside three 7-seat variants, gets total benefits to the tune of Rs 3.9 lakh. This includes a corporate discount of up to Rs 1.3 lakh on MY2024 models. The larger version of the Compass shares its powertrain options, and is currently priced between Rs 24.99 lakh and Rs 38.79 lakh.

Jeep Grand Cherokee discounts in June 2025

Up to Rs 3 lakh off

Along with a total of Rs 3 lakh in benefits, buyers of Jeep’s flagship SUV can avail free access to the Jeep Wave Exclusive ownership programme, which clubs various aftersales benefits like a warranty pack, adventure concierge services, and more. The Grand Cherokee is powered by a 272hp, 2.0-litre turbo-petrol engine that is paired to an 8-speed automatic that transmits power to all four wheels. Just last week, the American brand introduced the Grand Cherokee Signature Edition at Rs 69.04 lakh, which costs Rs 1.54 lakh more than the Rs 67.5 lakh Limited (O).

All prices, ex-showroom, India
